[source, python]
----
resp = client.search(
    index="kibana_sample_data_ecommerce",
    size=0,
    aggs={
        "daily_sales": {
            "date_histogram": {
                "field": "order_date",
                "calendar_interval": "day"
            },
            "aggs": {
                "revenue": {
                    "sum": {
                        "field": "taxful_total_price"
                    }
                },
                "cumulative_revenue": {
                    "cumulative_sum": {
                        "buckets_path": "revenue"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
